item.title: Creating a personal website with R-Blogdown
item.description: This blog post contains a tutorial to create a personal website using HUGO (a static website generator), RStudio and the R Blogdown package. This is the tutorial followed in the R-Ladies Leuven May Meetup. This tutorial is accompanied by an introductory presentation, available here (link not yet available). In this example, we will work with the “Academic” template, but many others are available. You can check them all and choose your favorite from here
